sourcing.instructions: - Cobalt: Obtain from chemical supply companies or online retailers.
steps: - Cobalt: Obtain from chemical supply companies or online retailers.
1. Prepare a clean workspace and gather all materials.
preparation.raw_text: 1. Prepare a clean workspace and gather all materials.

steps: 1. Transfer the mixed powder into a high-temperature furnace.
heating.raw_text: 1. Transfer the mixed powder into a high-temperature furnace.

steps: 1. Allow the material to cool in the furnace to room temperature naturally.
cooling.raw_text: 1. Allow the material to cool in the furnace to room temperature naturally.

steps: 1. Once cooled, carefully remove the solid sample from the furnace.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Once cooled, carefully remove the solid sample from the furnace.
